query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Campaign AS c WHERE c.employeeId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Campaign AS c WHERE c.companyId = ?1 AND c.recordDate >= ?2 AND c.recordDate <= ?3
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.campaignId = ?1 AND r.status = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.campaignId = ?1 AND r.campaignContactId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.companyId = ?1 AND r.contactPersonId = ?2 AND r.addressId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.companyId = ?1 AND r.campaignId = ?2 AND r.contactPersonId =?3 AND r.activityId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.companyId = ?1 AND r.campaignId = ?2 AND r.addressId =?3 AND r.contactPersonId =?4 AND r.activityId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId IS NULL and r.companyId = ?1 AND r.campaignId = ?2 AND r.addressId =?3 AND r.contactPersonId IS NULL AND r.activityId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId = ?1 AND r.active = true AND r.userId IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(r.campaignContactId) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId = ?1 AND r.active = true AND r.userId IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT r.userId FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId = ?1 AND r.active = true AND r.userId IS NOT NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.campaignId = ?1 AND r.activityId IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(r.campaignContactId) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.campaignId = ?1 AND r.activityId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId = ?1 AND r.addressId = ?2 AND r.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.activityId = ?1 AND r.addressId = ?2 AND r.contactPersonId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.addressId = ?1 AND r.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM CampaignContact AS r WHERE r.addressId = ?1 AND r.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT COUNT(c.campaignContactId) FROM CampaignContact as c WHERE c.activityId = ?1 AND c.userId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM CampaignContact AS c WHERE c.activityId = ?1 AND c.userId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignCriterion as a WHERE a.campaignId = ?1 AND a.campCriterionValueId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignCriterion as a WHERE a.campaignId = ?1 AND a.categoryId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignCriterion as a WHERE a.campaignId = ?1 AND a.campCriterionValueId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignCriterion as a WHERE a.campaignId = ?1 AND a.categoryId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignCriterionValue as a WHERE a.tableId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignText as t WHERE t.campaignId = ?1 AND t.byDefault=true
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignText as t WHERE t.campaignId = ?1 AND t.byDefault=true
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignText as t WHERE t.templateId = ?1 AND t.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignText as t WHERE t.templateId = ?1 AND t.companyId=?2 AND t.byDefault=true
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignText as t WHERE t.freeTextId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CampaignActivity as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 AND a.campaignId = ?2 AND a.activityId <> ?3
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignTemplate as t WHERE t.campaignId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignTemplate as t WHERE t.campaignId = ?1 AND t.documentType = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignActivityContact as t WHERE t.contactId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignActivityContact as t WHERE t.contactId = ?1 AND t.generationId IS NOT NULL
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignActivityContact as t WHERE t.campaignId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM CampaignGeneration as g WHERE g.activityId = ?1 AND g.templateId = ?2 AND g.generationTime > ?3
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM CampaignGeneration as g WHERE g.templateId = ?1 AND g.generationTime > ?2 AND g.activityId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM CampaignGeneration as g WHERE g.templateId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(g) FROM CampaignGeneration as g WHERE g.campaignId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(ct) FROM CampaignTextImg AS ct WHERE ct.templateId=?1 and ct.languageId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM CampaignGenTextImg AS t WHERE t.campaignGenTextId =?1
SELECT c.totalSent FROM CampaignSentLog AS c WHERE c.generationKey = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1 AND (c.status = 2 OR c.status = 3 OR c.status = 4 OR c.status = 5)
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1 AND (c.status = 2 OR c.status = 3 OR c.status = 4 OR c.status = 5)
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1 AND c.status = 1
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1 AND c.status = ?2
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.generationKey = ?1 AND c.status = 1
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.generationKey = ?1 AND (c.status = 2 OR c.status = 3 OR c.status = 4 OR c.status = 5)
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.addressId = ?1 AND c.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.addressId = ?1 AND c.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT MIN(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.status = ?1
SELECT COUNT(c.sentLogContactId) FROM SentLogContact AS c WHERE c.campaignSentLogId = ?1 AND (c.status = 6 OR c.status = 7)
